title: Is my internet speed good enough
body:
Um  i live in a caribbean island and i have been wondering if my internet is good enough Download:1Mbps
, Upload:0.5 Mbps
 and i usually get like 120ms from servers in NA (Speedtest by ookla)

replies.body: You do have a physical distance from the NA server, so the strength of your connection can't exceed that.  As long as you're able to play without issues then you're solid, but you can take measures to increase the strength of your network through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  I hope that helps!

urm sorry to rain on your day but i run at 8Mbms and im at 30 ish ping and only just works. 120 ms is unplayable, especially as you get better at the game, and ur reactions become slow ingame. mybe try buying a cheap wifi booster or maybe try using LAN (the yellow cable that you can plug in to ur computer directly from the router)

So i should be able to get good games at lower ranked matches  then ?
Because i am connected via ethernet and that speed/ms is constant unless someone else is on the internet
